TopicTitle: APOLLO (SATURN-V with F1 & J2, APOLLO CSM, LEM, LLRV). by OLDD (v.1.4. 09.05.14)

Articles.Content: I'm having a problem with the first stage. I take off and when I get to about 6000m the craft just implodes and pieces go spinning everywhere or explode. When I look at the flight details it says structural failure on tons of parts. It is not overheating also I checked. Any help?

well, i'm on the way to check all in new KSP version.

also, do u have kerbalJointReinforceent installed?

as i heard, FAR and RSS can also cause a problem. i didnt do adaptation myself, but heard that it are on forum.

Just a quick question.

Why does the apollo CM have a 800 degree reentry heat max? Is that what the real life pod heat max actually is?

Want to report something that should probably be in the red text about FASA's incompatibilities on the OP.

\FASA\Apollo\Resources\ScienceDefs.cfg MUST be deleted or all science everywhere will be lost! Quite literally, every science experiment from Crew Reports to Gravioli scans will no longer show up when you right click the modules, simply because FASA has a duplicate ScienceDefs.cfg
DENNY there will be a lunar car in the new updating

DENNY there will be a lunar car in the new updating

Are you asking dennytx if he will add the LRV, or are you saying that there will be a stockalike LRV in ksp .25?

I love this mod so much. It's beautiful. When I try to fly it, though, I get an error from RPM saying "Initialization Error, Check Configuration." Is this something I did wrong or is there another issue? I can post a log file if needed.

I love this mod so much. It's beautiful. When I try to fly it, though, I get an error from RPM saying "Initialization Error, Check Configuration." Is this something I did wrong or is there another issue? I can post a log file if needed.

seems like i got needing to update it, because of some changes in RPM in its last versions. with new knowledge i got last 3 months i redid all meshes, added some new functions (and dependensies) and i hope - detalisation of models will grows up. despite this models becomes more lighter, i think new version will be 1.5 times lighter than current one. But saves will be broken ;(.

I was just coming here to post this, glad to see you're working on it. I love this mod more than all others and most all my rockets are based off the LEM/CM setup. Keep it going!

As for the error with the RPM - I think I found if you stage once somewhere, the error goes away. Now just to make it not happen at all to begin with!

DennyTX: while you're working on this (yay! ) I have a question about the heatshield. I notice it has pegs, but I've never seen the actual capsule's heatshield with pegs. Were you maybe modeling it after a display model that had pegs for mounting?

DennyTX: while you're working on this (yay! ) I have a question about the heatshield. I notice it has pegs, but I've never seen the actual capsule's heatshield with pegs. Were you maybe modeling it after a display model that had pegs for mounting?

well, if you speaking about black pegs - i saw it only on blueprints, and as i have read, it must be burned out while descending. also, it itself does not support pegs, it are just amortisation gasket

Looking amazing, Denny!

Oh, by the way, just started using your mod over the FASA version, and I have a couple observations. Number 1, the Apollo heat shield should not be ejectable. They never ever ejected the heat shield of Apollo capsules. They weren't built to do that.

Number 2, I had this little glitch with the LEM IVA. Freddo Kerman seems quite enamoured of it.

And yes, I made sure to purge the FASA Apollo components.

best mod in the KSP look forward to updates

In regards to the RasterPropMonitor initialization error, I think I finally got the debug message for it in hopes you can provide a simple fix while you work on the latest update. In the debug console, it says:

RasterPropMonitor: Trying to locate "JSI/RasterPropMonitor/Example/ExampleMFD/MDF40x15004" in GameDatabase...

[Error]: RasterPropMonitor: INITIALIZATION ERROR, CHECK CONFIGURATION.

[Exception]: NullReferenceException: Object reference not set to an instance of an object.

This is with the latest RasterPropMonitor and the latest version of your mod.

I would assume this just means that something was moved in the hierarchy of RPM and you just need to tweak some config file to either remove it temporarily or something like this.

Thanks again for one of the best looking mods out!
